email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for the shipment of 4500 MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Houston on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 290m. The laycan is set for 10th to 15th October, and the initial freight quote is USD 65 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the prompt offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 60 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 62 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 10th to 15th October, and the loading window is still 24 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 62 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 10th October, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers
